content:
Hello. It's great to connect with you. I'm here to help you with your insurance needs, specifically with MSIG's TravelEasy and Scootsurance plans. Are you planning a trip soon or looking to protect your travels in general? Perhaps you'd like to know more about how our plans can help with unexpected events like trip cancellations or medical emergencies? 

Would you like to explore our TravelEasy Policy or Scootsurance options to see which one might be the best fit for you?

**Policy Documents:**
- [TravelEasy Policy QTD032212 (PDF)](http://127.0.0.1:8000/policy_pdf/TravelEasy Policy QTD032212.pdf)
- [TravelEasy Pre-Ex Policy QTD032212-PX (PDF)](http://127.0.0.1:8000/policy_pdf/TravelEasy Pre-Ex Policy QTD032212-PX.pdf)
- [Scootsurance QSR022206 (PDF)](http://127.0.0.1:8000/policy_pdf/Scootsurance QSR022206_updated.pdf)
